targets.query: SELECT last("DATABASE_ROLE") AS "Database role", last("OPEN_MODE") AS "Open mode", last("STARTUP_TIME") AS "Startup time", last("LOGINS") AS "Logins", last("LOG_MODE") AS "Archivelog mode", last("STATUS") AS "Mount Status" FROM "DatabaseInfo" WHERE ("host_name"::tag =~ /^$host_name$/ AND "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$instance_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("database_role") AS "Database role", last("open_mode") AS "Open mode", last("startup_time") AS "Startup time", last("logins") AS "Logins", last("archivelog") AS "Archivelog mode", last("status") AS "Mount Status" FROM "oracle_db_properties" WHERE ("host_name" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "db_unique_name" =~ /^$db_unique_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("DATABASE_ROLE") AS "Database role", last("OPEN_MODE") AS "Open mode", last("STARTUP_TIME") AS "Startup time", last("LOGINS") AS "Logins", last("LOG_MODE") AS "Archivelog mode", last("STATUS") AS "Mount Status" FROM "DatabaseInfo" WHERE ("host_name"::tag =~ /^$host_name$/ AND "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$instance_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("database_role") AS "Database role", last("open_mode") AS "Open mode", last("startup_time") AS "Startup time", last("logins") AS "Logins", last("archivelog") AS "Archivelog mode", last("status") AS "Mount Status" FROM "oracle_db_properties" WHERE ("host_name" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "db_unique_name" =~ /^$db_unique_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("session_count") FROM "session" WHERE ("host_name" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "db_unique_name" =~ /^$db_unique_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

SELECT last("file_size") AS "Size", last("tablepsace_name") AS "Tablespace" , last("space_used") AS "Space Used", last("maxsize") AS "Max Size", last("percent_used") AS "Percent" FROM "default"."DatafileInfo" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$instance_name$/ AND "host_name"::tag =~ /^$host_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "file_name"::tag

SELECT mean("avg_value") FROM "waitclassmetric" WHERE ("db_unique_name" =~ /^$db_unique_name$/ AND "host_name" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "wait_class" <> 'Idle') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "wait_class" fill(null)

SELECT mean("avg_value") FROM "waitclassmetric" WHERE ("db_unique_name" =~ /^$db_unique_name$/ AND "host_name" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "wait_class" <> 'Idle') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "wait_class" fill(null)
